identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Dark Console' log viewer that feels like a sci-fi control room, not a spreadsheet.

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS: Chivo (400,700), IBM Plex Sans (400,500,600), JetBrains Mono (400,500).

gradients.subtle_glow: radial-gradient(circle at top center, rgba(56, 189, 248, 0.15), transparent 40%)

structure.main_container: h-screen w-full bg-background text-foreground flex flex-col overflow-hidden
structure.header: h-14 border-b border-border/40 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md flex items-center px-6 justify-between z-50
structure.sidebar: w-64 border-r border-border/40 bg-card/30 hidden md:flex flex-col p-4 gap-4

log_table.row: group flex items-start gap-3 py-1.5 px-4 hover:bg-white/[0.02] border-b border-border/20 transition-colors cursor-pointer
log_table.level_badge: font-mono font-bold w-16 shrink-0 uppercase text-[10px] tracking-wider
log_table.message: font-mono text-foreground/90 break-all line-clamp-2 group-hover:line-clamp-none transition-all
log_table.metadata: hidden group-hover:flex gap-2 ml-auto opacity-60 text-[10px]

filter_bar.container: sticky top-0 z-40 bg-background/95 backdrop-blur border-b border-border/40 p-3 flex flex-wrap gap-3 items-center shadow-sm
filter_bar.input: bg-secondary/20 border-border/50 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-0 h-8 text-xs font-mono w-64 transition-all hover:bg-secondary/30

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-8 px-4 text-xs font-medium rounded-md shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(255,255,255,0.1)] transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-secondary/50 text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground h-8 w-8 p-0 rounded-md

cards.stat_card: bg-card/40 border border-border/40 p-4 rounded-lg backdrop-blur-sm hover:border-primary/20 transition-colors

visual_enhancers.scanlines: pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-[100] bg-[linear-gradient(rgba(18,16,16,0)_50%,rgba(0,0,0,0.1)_50%),linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(255,0,0,0.03),rgba(0,255,0,0.01),rgba(0,0,255,0.03))] bg-[length:100%_2px,3px_100%] opacity-20

images.description: Abstract neon lines on dark background, use for empty states or login screen background with overlay.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons (Search, Filter, Calendar, AlertCircle, Info, CheckCircle, XCircle, ChevronDown, RefreshCw).

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install fonts: Chivo, IBM Plex Sans, JetBrains Mono.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Update tailwind.config.js to extend the color palette with the 'Dark Console' colors defined above.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create a 'LogEntry' component that strictly follows the 'log_table' styles. Ensure the 'level_badge' dynamically changes color based on the log level.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Implement the 'FilterBar' as a sticky header. Use Shadcn 'Popover' for complex filters like Date Range.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Apply the 'scanlines' class to the main container for a subtle retro-tech feel (optional, but recommended for E1 style).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.

universal_guidelines.theme: Force DARK MODE. This is a developer tool.
universal_guidelines.density: High. Avoid excessive padding in the log list. Use 'py-1' or 'py-1.5' for rows.
universal_guidelines.contrast: Ensure text is readable. Use 'text-foreground' for primary info and 'text-muted-foreground' for timestamps/metadata.
universal_guidelines.animations: Micro-interactions only. Hover states on rows should be instant or very fast (75ms).
universal_guidelines.empty_states: Use the provided abstract image with a glassmorphism overlay for 'No logs found' or 'Welcome' screens.
